text: Mesopontonia monodactylus is a species of shrimp in the family Palaemonidae that was first described in 1991.Mesopotonia monodactylus Bruce, 1991. ITIS: The Integrated Taxonomic Information System. Orrell T. (custodian), 2011-04-26Chace, Fenner A., Jr., and A. J. Bruce (1993) The Caridean Shrimps (Crustacea: Decapoda) of the Albatross Philippine Expedition 1907-1910, pt. 6: Superfamily Palaemonoidea, Smithsonian Contributions to Zoology, no. 543 ==References== Category:Palaemonoidea Category:Crustaceans described in 1991
title: Mesopontonia monodactylus
